comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I have a doctor's excuse for missing today's Frenzy. I'll fax it over to Frenzy Central Thursday morning. How do I pay the fine? Cash? Check? Speedtype?

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: We only accept doctor's notes from shady physicians, known as _preparateurs_ in the cycling world. Usually, they make you better by taking some blood and replacing it later so you'll feel twice as strong as before. The Frenzy Headquarters is looking into hiring such a character, but they don't come cheap. Actually, [this guy](http://www.bicycling.com/article/0,6610,s1-3-12-13773-1,00.html) comes highly recommended....
